body_html:
@oscarriddle sorry to misunderstand you .
As you say "
Then I tried to restore previously trained frozen model, then TRT optimize it, and then export the optimized graph to a new frozen model. And the new one can be successfully restored and executed. This procedure is OK, though my online Tensorflow serving environment need to be recompiled from utilizing saved_model to frozen_model."
You mean that we need to recomplie the tensorflow serving environment that can recognizes the frozen graph . Can you talk about the specific compilation steps?
Thanks ~

body:
@oscarriddle sorry to misunderstand you . 
As you say "
Then I tried to restore previously trained frozen model, then TRT optimize it, and then export the optimized graph to a new frozen model. And the new one can be successfully restored and executed. This procedure is OK, though my online Tensorflow serving environment need to be recompiled from utilizing saved_model to frozen_model."
You mean that we need to recomplie the tensorflow serving environment that can recognizes the frozen graph . Can you talk about the specific compilation steps? 
Thanks ~
